data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Shu Kurata puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 1, Patric with an assist there.
Yokohama FC awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Gamba.
In the minute 6, In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Gamba to take a throw-in in Yokohama FC territory.
Gamba drives forward and Kazuma Watanabe gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 9, Gamba takes a corner from the right.
Gamba are pushing forward but Shinya Yajima's finish is wide of the goal.
Gamba pushes forward through Kazuma Watanabe, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 11, Corner awarded to Gamba.
Gamba are coming forward and Kohei Okuno gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Can Gamba capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 12, Patric (Gamba) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Yokohama FC are whistled for offside.
In the minute 15, It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
Yokohama FC's Yusuke Minagawa attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Gamba have a goal kick.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
Hiroki Fujiharu is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Gamba's Hiroki Fujiharu is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 20, Yokohama FC awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yokohama FC drive upfield and Kosuke Saito gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Gamba defender.
Can Yokohama FC capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gamba's half?
In the minute 23, Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Yokohama FC needs to be cautious. Gamba have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Yokohama FC in their own half.
In the minute 26, Can Yokohama FC get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
Free kick for Gamba in the half of Yokohama FC.
Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Gamba in Yokohama.
Yokohama FC have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 32, Eijiro Takeda of Yokohama FC smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Reo Yasunaga of Yokohama FC gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Gamba at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
In the minute 34, Free kick Yokohama FC.
Throw-in for Gamba in the half of Yokohama FC.
Gamba are caught offside.
In the minute 39, Gamba have a goal kick.
Yokohama FC's Kosuke Saito is on target but unsuccessful.
Yokohama FC's Katsuhiro Nakayama misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 44, It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Katsuhiro Nakayama of Yokohama FC gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Corner awarded to Yokohama FC.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Patric of Gamba smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Gamba are pushing forward but Shinya Yajima's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Yokohama FC at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
In the minute 47, Yokohama FC drives forward and Yusuke Minagawa gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Gamba's Kazuma Watanabe is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 48, Yokohama FC are coming forward and Masahiko Inoha gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Gamba have a goal kick.
Yokohama FC awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 50, Free kick for Yokohama FC in the half of Gamba.
Eijiro Takeda (Yokohama FC) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
In the minute 51, Yuki Yamamoto is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Yuki Yamamoto is back on his feet again.
Free kick Gamba.
In the minute 54, Goal kick for Yokohama FC at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Yokohama FC awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC close to the penalty box.
In the minute 56, Yokohama FC to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 59, Yokohama FC's Katsuhiro Nakayama misses with an attempt on goal.
In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Reo Yasunaga (Yokohama FC) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 64, Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Free kick Yokohama FC.
Takuya Matsuura is on a sub for Katsuhiro Nakayama for Yokohama FC.
Ball safe as Yokohama FC is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 67, The home team replace Yusuke Minagawa with Yuji Senuma.
Yokohama FC are pushing forward but Takuya Matsuura's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 68, Goal kick for Gamba at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Gamba have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Yokohama FC in the half of Gamba.
In the minute 71, Gen Shoji (Gamba) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Yokohama FC are coming forward and Kohei Tezuka gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 72, It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
Kohei Tezuka is replacing Kensuke Sato for the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Yokohama FC takes a corner from the left.
In the minute 80, Yokohama FC are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Gamba pushes forward through Shinya Yajima, whose finish on goal is saved.
Goal! Gamba extend their lead to 0-2 through Patric.
In the minute 81, Kazuma Watanabe instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for Yokohama FC in their own half.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Yokohama FC in the half of Gamba.
Yokohama FC make their fourth substitution with Kazuyoshi Miura replacing Koki Saito.
Yutaro Hakamata is replacing Eijiro Takeda for the home team.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC close to the penalty box.
In the minute 84, Kosuke Saito (Yokohama FC) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Yokohama FC drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Yokohama FC awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 86, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Yuki Kobayashi for Yokohama FC who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Yuki Kobayashi is back on the pitch.
Shoji Toyama is on a sub for Kazuma Watanabe for Gamba.
In the minute 88, Gamba needs to be cautious. Yokohama FC have an attacking throw-in.
Yutaro Hakamata (Yokohama FC) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Yokohama FC takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 89, Yokohama FC awarded a free kick in their own half.
The away team replace Patric with Dai Tsukamoto.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama FC's half?
Corner awarded to Gamba.
Yokohama FC have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-2.
